translation.en: How about a story?

translation.en: Even though we don't have to step on grapes to make wine nowadays,

translation.en: It was my mom's favorite.

My mother was the face of the company. She dealt with everyone.

translation.en: Okay, well, th… then we fix that.
I think we need to take advantage of the Christmas spirit

translation.es: no porque a la gente la obsesionaran nuestros panes o quesos,

translation.es: decirles que ansiamos verlos en el baile y desearles una feliz Navidad.

translation.en: I love it.
I'm not getting on the phone with every Tom, Dick, and Harry that we do business with.

translation.en: Oh, fine.
We'll take it from here.
I love you.
I know.
Your grandmother does the same thing? [chuckles]
I love it.

but believe me, by… by staying with us, you will…

translation.en: Um, you're gonna… By staying with us, you will…

-Is that even a question? -[laughs]

'Cause it's… it's the one time a year we have to ask for money. [sighs]

-They do. -[exhales]

-[smacks lips] Blueberries. -Mm-hmm

Yes! [laughs]
Oh, I'm sorry. [laughs] -That was really, really good. -[whispers] It's okay.
You okay?

Callie's been unreachable the last few days, and, um,

-She's just stressed. -Mmm.
Everyone turns into a bridezilla from time to time before their wedding day.

Exactly.
This is Callie we're talking about.
She's a big girl.
Yeah, right.

translation.en: -All right. Watch your step. -[gasps]
[whispers] Right.
I got you.
Callie, I want you to meet Susan.
Susan, this is Callie.

I mean, you single-handedly helped retain 80% of our suppliers.

-Well, you're welcome. -[Joseph chuckles]
And thank you.
Thanks to Victoria, I'll be returning home with an entirely new wardrobe.

[inhales] …it's just strange you haven't mentioned her before.

translation.en: Really? That's weird.
Cheers. [exhales]
Cheers.
Now, we can focus on everything else we have to fix.

Oh my gosh, no. I mean, yeah, it was… it was huge,

translation.es: Sí, fue tremendo, pero aún queda mucho por hacer.

What do you think of the city so far?
I never thought I'd say this, but I love it.

translation.es: y probar cafés diferentes todos los días en diferentes lugares.

Maybe it wouldn't be such a bad idea to spend some more time here.

translation.es: - Qué curioso, porque… - Hablando de eso, no hemos podido…

translation.en: It's a big decision. I can't make my mind up overnight.

translation.en: Well, I printed out a copy for you just in case.

translation.en: -You haven't told her yet? -No.
-What about last night? -Shh.
Best one yet.
Okay. So, we have the venue.
We have the suit. We have the dress.
translation.es: tenemos el traje, tenemos el vestido.

I don't know. I always thought I'd wear my mom's dress on my wedding day.
translation.es: Siempre me imaginé con el vestido de mi mamá.

translation.en: You'd be doing the world a disservice if you didn't wear that gorgeous dress.
translation.es: Sería una falta de respeto al mundo no usar ese vestido.

I watch sports. Go Niners.
[Victoria] Hello, lovebirds.
Leo. [inhales]
I want to personally thank you for the work you put in this week.

translation.en: You're like our perfect little Christmas gift, aren't you?
translation.es: Eres un regalo de Navidad perfecto, ¿no?

translation.en: -Hmm. -Thank you. I'm just happy I could help.
I told your fiancé to consider offering you an official position once you're all settled in.

translation.en: S… settled in?
I've got four gorgeous condominiums to show you, each over 3,000 square feet,
translation.es: Quiero mostrarles cuatro apartamentos de más de 900 metros cuadrados.

translation.en: killer views, perfect for potentially adding to the family within a year or two.
translation.es: Una vista espectacular, perfecto para tener bebés en un tiempo.

translation.en: You just let me know when you two cuties are ready to take a look at them.

translation.en: Condominiums?
That might be my fault.
I, um, sprang the news on them just yesterday--

My mother is stepping down from her position at Van Aston Enterprises permanently.

translation.en: The company will officially turn over to my name if I sign the paperwork.
translation.es: La empresa será mía si firmo los documentos.

translation.es: - Me sigues ocultando cosas. - Aún no lo decidí.

translation.en: -I was gonna tell you last night-- -So tell me now, then.
translation.es: - Iba a decírtelo anoche… - Dímelo ahora.

translation.en: What happens to our life in Petaluma?
Oh, I love the life that we've created.
translation.es: Me encanta la vida que creamos,

translation.es: pero deberías entender que es la empresa de mi papá.

translation.en: Either I sign the paperwork, or we lose everything that he worked for.

It's like you're trying to get rid of me.
-God, no. Callie, we can figure this out-- -Figure yourself out.
translation.es: - No, podemos resolverlo. - Resuelve tú qué te pasa.

I need some air.
Hey.
What did that ever do to you? I don't want it. Nothing's the same.

I mean, if they didn't, then you'd still be wearing diapers.

translation.es: No se enteró de que tuve puntos y me los quitaron.

translation.en: It's like she forgot about us.

How fun will that be?

translation.en: Okay?

All tickets are donation-based.
Profits support the homeless in the city.

translation.en: It's so crowded today.

Yeah. You… you didn't know?
-[sighs] The company is struggling and-- -Oh, don't feel like you need to explain.

[smacks lips] Um, no.

Good luck.

Whatever.

translation.en: So let us keep the spirit of Christmas in our hearts

Please leave a message.
[Owen] You killed it today.

It really does feel like yesterday.
You and Liam begging me to drive you to the movies.

You don't remember, do you?
Remember what?
How you and Liam used to fight like dogs over your futures.

translation.es: Él quería que lo siguieras a UC Davis, pero no, tú tenías que ir a St. Louis

translation.es: a estudiar economía social y agricultura como tu papá.

translation.en: I swear you two had a different plan every week.
translation.es: Cambiaban de plan todas las semanas.

translation.en: And then we never even got the chance to choose one.
translation.es: Y nunca tuvimos la oportunidad de elegir uno.

translation.en: You would've worked it out 'cause you loved each other.
translation.es: Lo habrían resuelto, porque se amaban.

translation.en: Yeah.

translation.es: No puedes obligar a Joseph a dejar la ciudad,

translation.en: You and Joseph will work it out.
[Victoria] Where you headed?
Um, j… just back to the hotel. It's a block away. I can walk.

translation.en: Nonsense.
Vanilla chai, right?
Thank you.
Tell me, how are you feeling about everything, dear?
I'm just a little tired of it all, to be honest.
Oh, honey.
If you're tired now, wait until you're a few days out from the big day. You won't sleep a wink.

translation.en: I was awake for a full 36 hours before my wedding.

translation.en: How long have you been married?
The wedding never happened. We called it off.
More like he called it off.
I'm sorry to hear that.
I have to say it looks much better on your hand than it did on mine.
translation.es: La verdad, a ti te queda mucho mejor que a mí.

translation.en: Looks better on thicker hands.

translation.en: No offense, of… of course. It's beyond gorgeous.

translation.en: Oh, he didn't tell you we were engaged?
[inhales] Oh my.
It seems I'm always revealing too much too soon.
-Callie, what are you doing? -Owen's soup kitchen lost all its funding.
translation.es: Callie, ¿qué haces? El comedor de Owen perdió su financiación.

translation.en: That's what this is about?
Cal, we had to make cuts to keep the lights on.
I told him we'd try to pick it up after the gala if the suppliers reconfirmed, but--
translation.es: Le dije que volveríamos a ayudarlos si los proveedores confirmaban…

translation.en: The company can afford to put on a gala that costs more than what most people make in a year,
translation.es: La empresa puede pagar un baile que cuesta más que un salario anual,

translation.en: and you're telling me you can't afford to help people
translation.es: ¿pero no puede ayudar a la gente

translation.en: who would give anything for a hot meal during the holidays?
translation.es: que solo quiere comer algo caliente en las fiestas?

translation.es: ¿Cuánto cuesta el salón de la boda?

translation.en: You know, we could get married at the winery for free.
translation.es: Podríamos casarnos en el viñedo gratis.

translation.en: That's what I pictured for us.
[sighs] You and me, a few special guests, my family's land.
translation.es: Tú y yo, algunos invitados especiales, la tierra de mi familia.

translation.en: But you wouldn't know that, would you? Because you never asked me.
translation.es: Pero no podías saberlo, porque nunca me preguntaste.

translation.en: And I don't understand how you can stand there
and continue to keep secrets from me after everything we've been through.
translation.es: cómo sigues ocultándome cosas después de todo lo que vivimos.

translation.en: If you wanted to give me a secondhand ring,
translation.es: Si querías darme un anillo usado,

translation.en: you could have asked me for Liam's.
It's cut better for my fat fingers, according to Victoria.
translation.es: El corte va mejor con mis dedos gordos, como dijo Victoria.

translation.en: [Joseph] Victoria? What are you talking about--
I'm glad we came here
to realize that you belong in this city, Joseph.
translation.es: pues descubrí que esta ciudad es tu lugar.

translation.en: I don't.
All right. All right. Spit it out.
-The wine? -No! Not the wine!
No. Y… you said you wanted to walk and talk, and so we walked and talked all the way up here.
translation.es: Querías caminar y hablar, así que caminamos y hablamos hasta aquí.

translation.en: My calves hurt, and I know that you got more on your mind.
translation.es: Me duelen las pantorrillas y sé que pasa algo más.

translation.en: [smacks lips] You don't have to be afraid because I'm…
translation.es: No tengas miedo solo porque me…

translation.en: [mumbling] …falling in love with you.
-What? -What?
[smacks lips] I'm…
falling in love with you.
-Oh, wow, uh… -I'm sorry.
No. I just wasn't expecting--
-No, I get it. That's… that's fine. -That's why I was gonna…
translation.es: - No, entiendo, está bien. - Por eso iba a…

translation.en: -Wow. Um… -Sorry.
I think I'm falling for you too.
I mean, I am.
I'm falling in love with you.
For real?
-[Brandy] Mm-hmm. -You are?
[chuckles] I am.
Okay, just…
Okay. You do so much for Callie
and her family
and this land. [exhales heavily]
I just… I wanna know what you want.
translation.es: Y… quisiera saber qué quieres tú.

translation.en: Where do you see yourself in, like, five, ten years?
translation.es: ¿Dónde te imaginas en cinco o diez años?

translation.en: [Victoria] Joseph? Joseph!
Well,
you got what you wanted.
What are you talking about?
[Joseph] You drove her away
because you're still not over that you and I didn't work out.
translation.es: porque no superas que lo nuestro no funcionara.

translation.en: [Victoria] Oh, Joseph, tell me you're not blaming me for your lack of honesty.
translation.es: Joseph, no me culpes por tu falta de honestidad.

translation.en: You know how much she means to me.
translation.es: Sabes lo que ella significa para mí.

translation.en: I didn't do anything wrong.
You only have yourself to blame.
[inhales] Besides,
seems like you both dodged a bit of a bullet.
translation.es: parece que los dos se salvaron.

translation.en: What?
[smacks lips] I should probably cancel the venue.
Picture's in your email.
-Do you wanna talk about it now or later? -Nope!
translation.es: - ¿Hablamos de esto ahora o después? - No.

translation.en: You know, I was right.
I kept him on the farm all year long to avoid the inevitable.
translation.es: Lo hacía quedarse en la granja para evitar lo inevitable.

translation.en: And… and a recycled ring from an ex-fiancée I knew nothing about?
translation.es: ¿Un anillo reciclado de una exprometida que no mencionó?

translation.en: -God! -Maybe there's more to this story.
It doesn't matter. For him to even consider that I'd uproot my life and leave everything behind?
translation.es: No importa. ¿Que considerara que yo podía abandonar toda mi vida?

Okay.

You're my family.
And, uh,

translation.en: -[chuckles] No. -No.
Well, see, when we're born,
we all come with this invisible backpack,
you know, to put your experiences and… and your memories in.
translation.es: donde guardamos nuestras experiencias y nuestros recuerdos.

translation.en: You know, for some people, well, that backpack just weighs a few pounds.

translation.en: Gosh, you hardly even notice it's there.
translation.es: Casi ni se dan cuenta de que está ahí.

translation.en: But for others, it can feel like the weight of the world
translation.es: Pero otros sienten que cargan con el mundo entero

translation.en: just sits on their shoulders.
And sometimes, you don't find out what's in your partner's backpack

That's okay.
We all have baggage, you know?
Parts of ourselves we'd rather keep hidden

translation.es: incluso a nuestros seres más queridos.

Eight.

translation.en: Barefoot.

maybe that's okay.

to everyone. [exhales]

♪ I love you in a forever kind of way ♪

translation.en: [Callie] Joseph!
